content.query:
CREATE DATABASE YellowTaxi
GO 


-- Create a Credentail for ADLS using MSI
CREATE CREDENTIAL [https://sfmarc3cusbstgsdataanaly.dfs.core.windows.net]
WITH IDENTITY='Managed Identity'
GO

-- Grant Credential access for MARCAdmin User
GRANT REFERENCES ON CREDENTIAL::[https://sfmarc3cusbstgsdataanaly.dfs.core.windows.net] TO [MARCAdmin];
GO
